title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the SkillsMarketplace platform, including user roles, features, and functionality. Ensure to cover both functional and non-functional requirements, such as performance, scalability, security, accessibility, and data privacy. Involve relevant stakeholders (e.g., HR, legal, security) to understand organizational policies and constraints.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, database, and infrastructure components. Consider the following aspects: scalability, high availability, security, performance, and maintainability. Provide a detailed architecture diagram and documentation.

title: Develop Frontend
description: Implement the user interface and frontend components for the SkillsMarketplace platform.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the backend services, APIs, and business logic for the SkillsMarketplace platform.

title: Set up Database
description: Design and implement the database schema and data models for the SkillsMarketplace platform.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Implement security measures, authentication, and access controls for the SkillsMarketplace platform.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Configure a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for the SkillsMarketplace platform.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create user guides, technical documentation, and other supporting materials for the SkillsMarketplace platform.

title: Conduct Testing
description: Plan and execute various testing activities, including unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing.

title: Deploy to Production
description: Deploy the SkillsMarketplace platform to the production environment and perform final testing and validation.
